{"id":347331767,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 6 months","timestamp":1590968103,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"60 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/347331767/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Median of Two Sorted Arrays","memory":"89.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double findMedianSortedArrays(vector<int>& nums1, vector<int>& nums2) {\n        vector<int> ans;\n        for(int c : nums1) ans.push_back(c);\n        for(int c : nums2) ans.push_back(c);\n        sort(ans.begin(),ans.end());\n        int n = ans.size();\n        if(n%2 == 0){\n            return (1.0*ans[n/2] +  ans[-1 + n/2])/2;\n        }else{\n            return ans[n/2];\n        }\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"median-of-two-sorted-arrays"}
